io.reinert.requestor.core

Interface MutableRequest

  • All Superinterfaces:
    HasHeaders, HasPollingOptions, RequestOptions
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    MutableSerializedRequest, ProcessableRequest, RequestInProcess, SerializedRequestInProcess

    public interface MutableRequest
extends RequestOptions, HasHeaders, HasPollingOptions
    A request with setters.
    Author:
    Danilo Reinert

    • Method Summary

      • setAuth

        void setAuth(Auth.Provider authProvider)
        Sets the necessary information for authenticating the request against the server.
        Parameters:

      • setTimeout

        void setTimeout(int timeoutMillis)
        Sets the number of milliseconds to wait for a request to complete.

        Should the request timeout, registered RejectedCallbacks will be called in the returning Request. The callback method will receive an instance of the RequestTimeoutException class as its Throwable argument.

        Parameters:
        timeoutMillis - Number of milliseconds to wait before canceling the request, a value of zero disables timeouts

      • setRetry

        void setRetry(int[] delaysMillis,
              RequestEvent... events)
        Set a retry policy for this request.

        Parameters:
        delaysMillis - The times in milliseconds to wait before each consecutive retry
        events - The events that will trigger a retry

      • setRetry

        void setRetry(RetryPolicy retryPolicy)
        Set a retry policy for this request.

        Parameters:
        retryPolicy - The retry policy implementation

      • setRetry

        void setRetry(RetryPolicy.Provider retryPolicyProvider)
        Set a retry policy for this request.

        Parameters:
        retryPolicyProvider - The retry policy provider

      • incrementPollingCount

        int incrementPollingCount()
        The poll counter is incremented by 1.
        Returns:
        the updated polling count.
